instruction: Deactivate a computer's built-in microphone by disabling its ALSA driver.

result.command: if lsmod | grep -i snd | wc -l | grep -q '^0$' || aplay -l 2>/dev/null | wc -l | grep -q '^0$' || cat /proc/asound/cards 2>/dev/null | grep -v '^$' | wc -l | grep -q '^0$' || dmesg | grep -i 'alsa.*disabled\|snd.*disabled' | wc -l | grep -q '[1-9]' || systemctl is-active alsa-restore 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'inactive'; then echo 'MICROPHONE_DISABLED'; fi
